turns.speaker: client
turns.text: double chocolaty chip creme frappuccino

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What store do you wish to order from for pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 5365 State Rt 233, Westmoreland, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alrighty.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please make sure you order the drink without whipped cream this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For sure, what size would you like it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have venti for that drink, do you know?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they do, ma'am.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay great! Then make it a venti iced please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okie doke.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you check online and see what milks they offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. They have almond, coconut, nonfat, whole, 2%, and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond for sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Online they state that there may be some allergen contamination, but they have nothing that states things that may affect you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not worried about it there, I go there often.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So let me just read this back to you quick.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go ahead when you're ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So a venti double chocolaty chip creme frap, blended creme. Made with almond milk and no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alrighty then, I'll be there with it soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, bye bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye.
